## IEntityRendererProvider interface

Wrapper of [IEntityRendererFactory](./core.ientityrendererfactory.md) to get entity renderers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IEntityRendererProvider<TEntityRenderer extends TUnknownEntityRenderer> 
```
